thread.title: Gorillaz Announce Demon Dayz Festival, First Show In 5 Years
thread.title_full: Gorillaz Announce Demon Dayz Festival, First Show In 5 Years

author: Stereogum
title: Gorillaz Announce Demon Dayz Festival, First Show In 5 Years
text: Gorillaz seem to be readying for a big comeback in 2017; they've already teamed up with Benjamin Clementine on the single " Hallelujah Money ." And now they've announced that their first live show since 2012 won't just be a live show; it'll be a whole festival that they've put together. As NME points … More »
